articles.description: Some of the restrictions placed on those visiting patients at Intermountain Healthcare will be eased starting Memorial weekend.  The number of visitors allowed to see patients was limited during the initial outbreak of COVID-19. Now, more visitors will be all…

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Scientists say they may have found a skinny gene - KPRC Click2Houston
articles.description: Preliminary genetic research, only tested in flies and mice, shows that humans may have a gene that controls weight gain, a new study finds.
articles.content:
(CNN) -- We all know the type. They can eat all they want, spend zero time at the gym and don't put on an ounce.
Now, according to new preliminary research published Thursday in the journal Cell, sc… [+3297 chars]
